00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_REDUNDANCY_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_REDUNDANCY_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00034 namespace detail {
00035 
00036 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00037 
00045 class parameters_redundancy_checker : public checker {
00046 public:
00047     parameters_redundancy_checker( const parameters&                    registered_parameters
00048                                    , const parameter_parts_extractor&   extractor
00049                                    , const std::string&                 name_value_separator ) :
00050             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {}
00051 public:
00052     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00053         const size_t inputed_parameters_quantity = inputed_parameters.size();
00054         const size_t registered_parameters_quantity = registered_parameters.size();
00055         if ( inputed_parameters_quantity > registered_parameters_quantity ) {
00056             notify_about_parameters_redundancy( inputed_parameters_quantity, registered_parameters_quantity );
00057         } else {} 
00058     }
00059 private:
00060     void notify_about_parameters_redundancy( size_t   inputed_parameters_quantity
00061                                              , size_t registered_parameters_quantity ) const {
00062         o_stream what_happened;
00063         what_happened << lib_prefix() 
00064                       << "You inputs " << inputed_parameters_quantity << " parameters, "
00065                       << "but only " << registered_parameters_quantity << " registered!";
00066         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened.str() );
00067     }
00068 };
00069 
00070 } // namespace detail
00071 } // namespace clpp
00072 
00073 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_REDUNDANCY_HPP
